# Quick Task Checklist

For small features, bug fixes, and minor changes (< 2 hours of work).

## Essential Steps

- [ ] Read relevant docs if unfamiliar with area
- [ ] Check existing patterns for similar functionality
- [ ] Make the change following existing patterns
- [ ] Write/update tests if logic changes
- [ ] Run `make lint && make typecheck && make test`
- [ ] Create simple PR with clear description
- [ ] Address review feedback

## When to Use Full Checklist Instead

- New pipeline stages
- New CLI commands
- Complex parsing changes
- Multi-file refactoring
- Performance optimizations

---

**Usage**: Use this for straightforward tasks. Escalate to full checklist when complexity increases.
